*div1 type="summary"* *p*Price list, April 26, 1825. Commerce. Biographical.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**person_mentioned*Colo Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Bot of *person_mentioned*Thos Westall*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-10-1825">10th March*/date_mentioned**/p* *p* 7yds domestic 1.00___________________________________ $7.00 */p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-04-1825">4 " */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Bro holland*/person_mentioned* 1.00________________________________ $4.00 */p* *p*Thread____________________________________________ 37 1/2
*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-11-1825">11th */date_mentioned* 1 lb Tobacco 150 1 skn silk 25________________________ $1. 75
*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-15-1825">15th */date_mentioned* 1 Doz Segares 25 Thread 50__________________________ 75
